title: AlgoSort
short: A webapp to learn DSA & Math for Competitve Programming with visualizations.
long: Built an interactive CP learning web app that explains DSA and math through algorithm visualizations, tutorials, step-by-step breakdowns and a clean topic-based layout.

title: Prompt to Layout
short: An interactive webapp which previews UI ideas based on user prompt.
long: Prompt to Layout is a full-stack UI studio that maps selected prompts into structured UI layout specs. It generates a component tree (JSON) and provides corresponding React code, renders a real-time preview with themes/variants, and lets users export the output as a ZIP for reuse.
